mapper.sql: fid, fbankname, fownername, fbankaddress, fbanknumber, fcreatetime, fstatus, version, fbanktype, fsortid, fusetype, fbankcode
mapper.select: select from f_system_bankinfo_recharge where fbanktype = #{fbanktype} and fstatus = 1
mapper.insert: insert into f_system_bankinfo_recharge ( fbankname, fownername, fbankaddress, fbanknumber, fcreatetime, fstatus, version, fbanktype, fsortid, fusetype, fbankcode ) values ( #{fbankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fownername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbankaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbanknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fbanktype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fsortid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fusetype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fbankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update f_system_bankinfo_recharge set fbankname = #{fbankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fownername = #{fownername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fbankaddress = #{fbankaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fbanknumber = #{fbanknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fcreatetime = #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fstatus = #{fstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, version = version + 1, fbanktype = #{fbanktype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fsortid = #{fsortid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fusetype = #{fusetype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fbankcode = #{fbankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and version = #{version}
mapper.select: select from f_system_bankinfo_recharge where fstatus =#{fstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by fsortid

select count(fid) from f_system_bankinfo_recharge where 1=1
and ( fbankname like concat('%',#{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or fownername like concat('%',#{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') )
